item.title: Sightation Counts: Leveraging Sighted User Feedback in Building a BLV-aligned Dataset of Diagram Descriptions
item.description: SIGHTATION: A BLV-aligned dataset utilizing sighted user feedback to enhance diagram descriptions generated by VLMs, improving accessibility for visually impaired learners.

item.title: Reangle-A-Video: 4D Video Generation as Video-to-Video Translation
item.description: Reangle-A-Video generates synchronized multi-view videos from a single video via video-to-video translation, surpassing existing methods without specialized 4D training.
